module.name: amavis
module.summary: Daemon that interfaces mail transfer agents and content checkers, such as virus scanners.

interface.name: amavis_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute a domain transition to run amavis.

interface.name: amavis_spool_filetrans
interface.summary: Create objects in the amavis spool directories with a private type.

param.name: object_class
param.summary: Class of the object being created.

interface.name: amavis_manage_lib_files
interface.summary: Create, read, write, and delete amavis lib files.

interface.name: amavis_setattr_pid_files
interface.summary: Set the attributes of amavis pid files.
